advice_blocks.title: I-Statements + Listener Reflector
advice_blocks.body: Replace blame with ownership. Practice reflective listening.
steps: Use: When X happens, I feel Y, and I need Z.
Listener paraphrases and validates before responding.
Schedule 10 minutes daily for this ritual.

advice_blocks.title: Safety First: Boundaries & Transparency
advice_blocks.body: Set clear, mutual boundaries and short feedback loops to rebuild safety.
steps: Agree 3 non-negotiable boundaries each.
Weekly trust check-in: What built trust? What eroded it?
If breach occurs, follow repair script within 24h.

advice_blocks.title: Time-Out & Repair Protocol
advice_blocks.body: Prevent escalation; prioritize repair over victory.
steps: Define time-out cue; step away 20–40 minutes.
Return with softened start-up: feelings + needs.
End with a small repair gesture.

advice_blocks.title: Connection Windows & Non-Sexual Touch
advice_blocks.body: Schedule intimacy that doesn’t depend on spontaneity.
steps: Two 30-min windows per week, mutually agreed.
5-minute daily non-sexual touch ritual.
Discuss accelerators/brakes using yes/no/maybe lists.

advice_blocks.title: Protected Quality Time
steps: Two 45-min screen-free blocks weekly.
Walk-and-talk checklist; share one appreciation each.
Sunday planning: 15-min calendar sync.

advice_blocks.title: Money Date + Values-Based Budget
advice_blocks.body: Align spending with shared values; reduce blame loops.
steps: List top 3 values; map to budget categories.
Weekly 20-min money date (facts → feelings → decisions).
Create frictionless default for savings.

advice_blocks.title: Boundary Scripts with Extended Family
advice_blocks.body: Present a united front; pre-agree scripts.
steps: Define 3 boundary scripts for common scenarios.
Signal support: partner speaks first in their family context.
Debrief post-visit for wins & tweaks.

advice_blocks.title: Fair Play Chore Rebalance
advice_blocks.body: Make invisible labor visible and fairly owned.
steps: Inventory top 10 tasks with owner + quality bar.
Reassign 2 items weekly based on capacity.
Monthly renegotiation check-in.

advice_blocks.title: Apology That Lands
advice_blocks.body: Acknowledge impact, not intention; offer a make-good.
steps: Template: I did X. Impact on you was Y. No excuses.
Ask: What would help repair this?
Schedule a symbolic repair gesture.

advice_blocks.title: Mutual Wellbeing Pact
advice_blocks.body: Support each other’s individual growth to enrich the relationship.
steps: Each declares one personal goal and one ask of partner support.
Weekly check-in: effort not outcomes.
Protect 1 solo recharge block per person.
